questions.question: How can I reset my password?
questions.reply: You can reset your password by clicking on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and following the instructions.

questions.question: My order has not arrived yet.
questions.reply: Please check your order status in the 'My Orders' section of your account. If the estimated delivery date has passed, kindly contact our support team with your order number.

questions.question: I am unable to log in to my account.
questions.reply: Ensure that you are using the correct email and password. If the issue persists, try resetting your password or clearing your browser cache.

questions.question: Hello
questions.reply: Hello! How can I assist you today?

questions.question: Hi
questions.reply: Hi there! How can I help you today?

questions.question: What are your support hours?
questions.reply: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

questions.question: How can I track my order?
questions.reply: You can track your order from the 'My Orders' section in your account.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.reply: You can contact our customer support via email or through the support section on our website.

questions.question: Thank you
questions.reply: You're welcome! If you need further assistance, feel free to ask.

sorryMessage: Sorry, Did not understand your query!
